{
"help_flow#open_file_chooser:sideloading_file_mask": """\
tap to open/close
the file chooser
to select the
file offered via
sideloading.""",
"help_flow#open_iterable_displayer:sideloading file info": """\
tap to display more
detailed info for
the file offered
via sideloading.""",
"help_flow#open_qr_displayer:sideloading_url": """\
tap to display
the QR code of
the URL of the
sideloading
server.""",
"help_flow#open_sideloading_menu": """\
tab to open the menu of
the sideloading server.""",
"help_flow#start_sideloading_server": """\
tap to start the
sideloading-server.""",
"help_flow#stop_sideloading_server":  """\
tap to stop the
sideloading-server.""",
